content: अभ्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Huge, large(महत् Nir). {@--2@} Mighty strong or powerful. --भ्वं {@--1@} Immense power, immensity. {@--2@} Monstrosity, hugeness; (the great pervading principle of the universe; water; a cloud; embarrassed state, calamity; a monster; closeness; offspring, given by <ls>B. and R.</ls>)
